entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Label doesn't render correctly when in a Grid with column definitions #10494
  • RadioButton template layout broken #10491
    7.0
  • Force Light theme makes certain controls not change colour #10490
    Backlog
  • Built-in Responsive Flyouts #10487
    Backlog
  • [Android]First added entry get focus when unfocusing the second added entry dynamically in navigation page #10486
    Backlog
  • [Android] OnNavigatedTo is called with PreviousPage when application is revoked from background #10485
  • [MacCatalyst] Frame BackgroundColor is not working #10484
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] Frame is not clipping the Content #10483
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] SearchBar background color is not working #10482
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] Image not respecting parent size #10481
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] BoxView CornerRadius property is not working #10480
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] CollectionView is not rendering #10479
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] Image clipping with border not working #10478
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] Images are not loading #10475
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] Scroll not working in ScrollView #10474
    Backlog
  • Width calculation in the compatibility ButtonRenderer is broken #10473
    Backlog

Closed

  • Unable to build .NET MAUI application after upgrade to Visual Studio 17.3.5 #10448
  • [Bug] If user hasn't set a height or width constraint on a checkbox/entry/other input controls then we should default to a minimum of 44x44 #2957
    7.0-rc2
  • CarouselView Shows All Items at Once in Windows #7180
    Backlog
  • Command bound with MenuFlyoutItem is not getting executed, whereas Clicked event is working fine #5382
    7.0
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Adaptive Trigger on StackLayout crashes Windows. #7242
    .NET 7 Planning
  • AdaptiveTriggers not working #8492
    7.0
  • NavigationView cannot be null with navigation in modal #10235
    7.0
  • WinUI targets require location permissions set in manifest when asking for location #8842
    7.0
  • [Android] While debugging, app with ACTION_SEND Intent-Filter crashes when a file is shared to it #10384
    7.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Include shortened MSIs in multi-target drop #10495
  • Suppress obsolete path for EndPDFContent #10493
  • Add support for SecureStorage in Unpackaged apps #10476
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, 7.0

Merged

  • Remove NET6 pinning from main branch #10492
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Preserve the correct binding context for menu items #7358
    area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.2.0 to 4.3.1 #10461
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add min width/height to template styles of select controls #10425
    area/a11y
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 4.3.0 to 4.3.1 #10460
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix permissions in Windows #10477
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, 7.0
  • [Android] Fix crash relaunching App from sharing item #10457
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, 7.0
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10472
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Added groupId to ResourceDictionary template #10389
    area/tooling ⚙️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Essentials] Fixes IPreferences DateTime handling #9974
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Added Tag to map pin #10446
    community ✨
  • Fix top-left aligned shapes issue #10417
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Allow to reset an Image setting the Source to null #10371
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Build the net6 templates in net7 #9758
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Display alerts by Window #10368
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Add `UserAgent` property to `WebView` control. #10413
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-webview
